name: 03-recipe-handling-http-post-request
description: - **HTTP POST** method is is used to send data to the server. - We need to instruct the server how to accept and handle POST requests. - A **POST** request contains **data** within the body of the request. - The submission of web forms is done via an **HTTP POST** request.
author: Elom Atsou Agboka <opentech.consult@gmail.com> (https://github.com/OpenTechConsult)
